snippet.title: GigaBash - Mayhem Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
Let’s push the chaos up a notch! Mayhem Mode is coming to #GigaBash! 

Play dodgeball using a giant burger, test your friendship by passing a time bomb, shoot rockets at your pals for points, and more! This new game mode features a wacky collection of party games, designed to be easy to pick up, fun to watch, and even more fun to play! The game is set to release later this year on Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation 4, and Playstation 5. 

▾GigaBash Now Available On▾
🎮Xbox: https://bit.ly/44TIwL5
🎮Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/4218sCL
🎮Epic Games Store: bit.ly/3B0khw7
🎮Steam: bit.ly/3xRKjzT
🎮PlayStation: bit.ly/34hcr5y

Follow GigaBash news! 
Discord : https://discord.gg/gigabash
Newsletter : https://passionrepublicgames.com/subscribe

Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/gigabashgame
